comments.text: Don't try it on winter or rainy days as no toursits will come. Better hitch the border.
Europa point. Tourists come here with cars, park, look around and drive back. Easy targets. Had a lift all the way to Tarifa from here.
when i was there the spanisch were blocking the boarder and controlling everyone. so it took forever to get through. better wait on the other side of the boarder
After the border i get a stop until la ceuta town. waited 30 minutes

SPAIN / MOROCCO FRONTIER
HARD CROSSING DUE TO THE CROWD
DIRECTION TETOUAN / ALGECIRAS
Sign : Ask direcly to drivers, a lot are dissatisfied about the frontier system and because there is too much people screaming, crying, waiting hours for visas... It's a very hard point to hitchhike. 
Position : For the south, maybe walk a little after the taxi parking and put your sign... it will be more quiet
